@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+! { dg-do compile }
+!
+! Fix a regression introduced by the patch for PR70149.
+!
+    character (:), pointer :: ptr => NULL() ! The NULL () caused an ICE.
+    character (6), target :: tgt = 'lmnopq'
+    ptr => tgt
+    print *, len (ptr), ptr
+end
